message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I believe this is a generous offer considering the time pressure.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, reflecting the time pressure and potential loss in value for me.  Let's reach a deal and end this quickly.

I'm willing to concede a bit more to avoid further losses.  Let's settle on a 60/40 split. This is the last offer I'll make before the value drops even further.
